job_description:
About the role

PROIRON (THAILAND) LIMITED' is seeking a talented Finance and Accounting Specialist to join our team in Chon Buri. This is a full-time position where you will play a crucial role in maintaining the financial health and integrity of our growing organisation.

What you'll be doing

Prepare and analyse financial statements, including balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow statements

Manage accounts payable and accounts receivable processes

Reconcile bank statements and general ledger accounts

Assist with the preparation of budgets and financial forecasts

Ensure compliance with all relevant accounting standards and regulations

Provide financial reporting and data analysis to support business decision-making

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and implement process improvements

What we're looking for

Degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field

Minimum 3 years of experience in a finance or accounting role, preferably in the manufacturing or industrial sector

Strong knowledge of generally accepted accounting principles (GAAP) and financial reporting standards

Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail

Proficient in using financial software and spreadsheet applications (e.g., Excel, QuickBooks)

Effective communication skills to present financial information to both financial and non-financial stakeholders

Ability to work independently and as part of a team

Proficiency in Chinese is preferred

What we offer

At PROIRON (THAILAND) LIMITED', we are committed to providing a supportive and rewarding work environment. In addition to a competitive salary, we offer a comprehensive benefits package, including health insurance, retirement contributions, and opportunities for professional development and career growth.

About us

PROIRON (THAILAND) LIMITED' is a leading manufacturer of high-quality industrial equipment, serving customers across a range of industries. With a reputation for excellence and innovation, we are dedicated to driving growth and delivering exceptional value to our clients. Join our team and be a part of our continued success.

Apply now for this exciting opportunity!

Job brief


Our client is a leading global equipment manufacturing company, with business operations spanning worldwide. They are currently seeking a highly skilled Bilingual Finance Manager with a solid manufacturing background to oversee the full spectrum of financial management for their Thailand entity. This is an outstanding opportunity to join a reputable organization offering competitive compensation, comprehensive benefits, and a promising career growth platform.

Responsibilities

Manage all financial aspects related to the setup and operation of the Thailand factory, including financial accounting, analysis, tax compliance, and cash management.
Participate in the preparation and execution of annual business plans, providing expert financial support to drive business development.
Handle local tax filings, tax planning, and effectively coordinate audits and tax inspections to ensure full compliance with Thai tax regulations.
